text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO The WHO has been in the pocket of the Chinese Govt for some time now. The Chinese govt fed lies to the WHO regarding the coronavirus in which they recklessly disseminated these lies to the world. They were complicit in their due diligence to seek the truth regarding COVID-19.
